name: QUASIT

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the quasit's next turn.
